trans-unit.source: Describes how a shape is outlined.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> and thickness.
Thickness is relative to the geometry of the shape associated with this pen.
The Brush for this Pen.
The thickness of the Pen.
Gets or sets the fill the outline produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The fill of the outline produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Brush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.
This setting applies to both ends of each dash.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that describes the pattern of dashes generated by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles> class provides a set of predefined dash patterns.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A value that describes the pattern of dashes generated by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles.Solid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that there should be no dashes.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the type of shape to use at the end of a stroke.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The type of shape that ends the stroke.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.EndLineCap*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineJoin"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.LineJoin*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half this pen's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.
A miter is a joint made by beveling each of two surfaces to be joined to form a corner.
When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the pen's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.
This value is always a positive number greater than or equal to 1.
The default value is 10.0.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.MiterLimit*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the type of shape to use at the beginning of a stroke.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The type of shape that starts the stroke.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.StartLineCap*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the thickness of the stroke produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
Thickness is relative to the geometry of the shape associated with this pen.
Negative values are treated as though they were positive.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The thickness of the stroke produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
Default is `1`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*> dependency property.
To be added.
